00016     enum EventTypes {
00017         StartPluginEventType = QEvent::User+32,
00018         StopPluginEventType,
00019         GetHWFrameCountEventType,
00020         GetFrameEventType,
00021         IsConsoleHiddenEventType,
00022         ConsoleHideEventType,
00023         ConsoleUnHideEventType
00024     };

00026     struct StartStopPluginEvent : public QEvent
00027     {
00030         StartStopPluginEvent(const QString &plugin, bool startUnpaused)
00031             : QEvent(static_cast<QEvent::Type>(StartPluginEventType)),  plugin(plugin), flag(startUnpaused)  {}
00032         
00035         StartStopPluginEvent(bool doSave) 
00036             : QEvent(static_cast<QEvent::Type>(StopPluginEventType)), flag(doSave) {}
00037         
00038         QString plugin;
00039         bool flag;    
00040     };
00041     
00042     struct GetSetData
00043     {
00044         QSemaphore replySem, deleteOkSem;
00045         QVariant req;
00046         QVariant datum;
00047 
00048         template <typename T> void setReply(const T & t) {
00049             datum.setValue(t);
00050             replySem.release();
00051             deleteOkSem.acquire();
00052         }
00053         template <typename T> T getReply() {
00054             T ret;
00055             replySem.acquire();
00056             ret = datum.value<T>();
00057             deleteOkSem.release();
00058             return ret;
00059         }
00060 
00061     };
00062 
00063     struct GetSetEvent : public QEvent
00064     {
00065         GetSetEvent(int t) : QEvent(static_cast<QEvent::Type>(t)) {d = new GetSetData; deleteData = false; }
00066         ~GetSetEvent() { if (deleteData) delete d; d = 0; }
00067 
00068         GetSetData *d;
00069         bool deleteData;
00070     };
00071 
00072     struct GetHWFrameCountEvent : public GetSetEvent
00073     {
00074         GetHWFrameCountEvent() : GetSetEvent(GetHWFrameCountEventType) {}
00075     };
00076 
00077     struct GetFrameEvent : public GetSetEvent
00078     {
00079         GetFrameEvent(unsigned framenum, int datatype) : GetSetEvent(GetFrameEventType) { d->req.setValue(framenum); d->datum.setValue(datatype); }
00080     };
00081

00098 ConnectionThread::ConnectionThread(int sfd, QObject *parent)
00099     : QThread(parent), sockdescr(sfd)
00100 {
00101     installEventFilter(this);

00103 
00104 void ConnectionThread::run()
00105 {
00106     Debug() << "Thread started.";
00107     QTcpSocket sock;
00108     socketNoNagle(sockdescr);
00109     if (!sock.setSocketDescriptor(sockdescr)) {
00110         Error() << sock.errorString();
00111         return;
00112     }
00113     QString remoteHostPort = sock.peerAddress().toString() + ":" + QString::number(sock.peerPort());
00114     Log() << "Connection from peer " << remoteHostPort;
00115     QString line;
00116     forever {
00117         if (sock.canReadLine() || sock.waitForReadyRead()) {
00118             line = sock.readLine().trimmed();
00119             while (StimApp::instance()->busy()) {
00120                 // special case case, stimapp is busy so keep polling with 1s intervals                
00121                 Debug() << "StimApp busy, cannot process command right now.. trying again in 1 second";
00122                 sleep(1); // keep sleeping 1 second until the stimapp is no longer busy .. this keeps us from getting given commands while we are still initializing
00123             }
00124             // normal case case, stimapp not busy,  proceed normally
00125             QString resp;
00126             resp = processLine(sock, line);
00127             if (sock.state() != QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState) {
00128                 Debug() << "processLine() closed connection";
00129                 break;
00130             }
00131             if (!resp.isNull()) {
00132                 if (resp.length()) {
00133                     Debug() << "Sending: " << resp;
00134                     if (!resp.endsWith("\n")) resp += "\n";
00135                     sock.write(resp.toUtf8());
00136                 }
00137                 Debug() << "Sending: OK";
00138                 sock.write("OK\n");
00139             } else {
00140                 Debug() << "Sending: ERROR";
00141                 sock.write("ERROR\n");
00142             }            
00143         } else {
00144             if (sock.error() != QAbstractSocket::SocketTimeoutError 
00145                 || sock.state() != QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState) {
00146                 Debug() << "Socket error: " << sock.error() << " Socket state: " << sock.state();
00147                 break;
00148             }
00149         }
00150     }
00151     Log() << "Connection ended (peer: " << remoteHostPort << ")";
00152     Debug() << "Thread exiting.";
00153 }
00154 
00155 QString ConnectionThread::processLine(QTcpSocket & sock,
00156                                       const QString & line)
00157 {
00158     Debug() << "Got Line: " << line;
00159     QStringList toks = line.split(QRegExp("\\s+"), QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00160     if (toks.size() < 1) return false;
00161     QString cmd = toks.front();
00162     toks.pop_front();
00163     cmd = cmd.toUpper();
00164     if (cmd == "NOOP") {
00165         return ""; // noop command alwasy prints OK -- used to test server connectivity and for keepaliveage, etc
00166     } else if (cmd == "GETTIME") {
00167         return QString::number(getTime(), 'f', 9);
00168     } else if (cmd == "GETFRAMENUM") {
00169         StimPlugin *p = stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin();
00170         if (p) {
00171             return QString::number(p->getFrameNum());
00172         } else {
00173             Error() << "GETFRAMENUM command received but no plugin was running.";
00174         }
00175     } else if (cmd == "GETHWFRAMENUM") {
00176         GetHWFrameCountEvent *e = new GetHWFrameCountEvent();
00177         GetSetData *d = e->d;
00178         stimApp()->postEvent(this, e);
00179         unsigned hwfc = d->getReply<unsigned>();
00180         delete d;
00181         return QString::number(hwfc);
00182     } else if (cmd == "GETREFRESHRATE") {
00183         unsigned rate = stimApp()->refreshRate();
00184         return QString::number(rate);
00185     } else if (cmd == "GETWIDTH") {
00186         return QString::number(stimApp()->glWin()->width());
00187     } else if (cmd == "GETHEIGHT") {
00188         return QString::number(stimApp()->glWin()->height());
00189     } else if (cmd == "GETFRAME" && toks.size()) {
00190         bool ok;
00191         unsigned framenum = toks[0].toUInt(&ok);
00192         toks.pop_front();
00193         int datatype = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00194         if (toks.size()) {
00195             QString s = toks.join(" ").toUpper().trimmed();
00196             if (s == "BYTE") datatype = GL_BYTE;
00197             else if (s == "UNSIGNED BYTE") datatype = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE;
00198             else if (s == "SHORT") datatype = GL_SHORT;
00199             else if (s == "UNSIGNED SHORT") datatype = GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT;
00200             else if (s == "INT") datatype = GL_INT;
00201             else if (s == "UNSIGNED INT") datatype = GL_UNSIGNED_INT;
00202             else if (s == "FLOAT") datatype = GL_FLOAT;
00203             else {
00204                 Error() << "GETFRAME command invalid datatype `" << s << "'.";
00205                 return QString::null;
00206             }
00207         }
00208         if (ok) {
00209             GetFrameEvent *e = new GetFrameEvent(framenum, datatype);
00210             GetSetData *d = e->d;
00211             stimApp()->postEvent(this, e);
00212             QByteArray framedata = d->getReply<QByteArray>();
00213             delete d;
00214             if (!framedata.isNull()) {
00215                 sock.write((QString("BINARY DATA ") + QString::number(framedata.size()) + "\n").toUtf8());
00216                 sock.write(framedata);
00217                 return "";
00218             }
00219         }
00220     } else if (cmd == "LIST") {
00221         QList<QString> lst = stimApp()->glWin()->plugins();
00222         QString ret;
00223         QTextStream ts(&ret, QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Truncate);
00224         for(QList<QString>::const_iterator it = lst.begin(); it != lst.end(); ++it) {
00225             ts << (*it) << "\n";
00226         }
00227         ts.flush();
00228         return ret;
00229     } else if (cmd == "GETSTATS") {
00230         QString theStr("");
00231         QTextStream strm(&theStr, QIODevice::WriteOnly/*|QIODevice::Text*/);
00232         GetSetEvent *e = new GetHWFrameCountEvent();
00233         GetSetData *d = e->d;
00234         stimApp()->postEvent(this, e);
00235         unsigned hwfc = d->getReply<unsigned>();
00236         delete d;
00237         e = new IsConsoleHiddenEvent();
00238         d = e->d;
00239         stimApp()->postEvent(this, e);
00240         bool isConsoleHidden = d->getReply<bool>();
00241         delete d;
00242         StimPlugin *p = stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin();
00243 
00244         strm.setRealNumberPrecision(3);
00245         strm.setRealNumberNotation(QTextStream::FixedNotation);
00246         strm << "runningPlugin = " << (p ? p->name() : "") << "\n"
00247              << "isPaused = " << (stimApp()->glWin()->isPaused() ? "1" : "0") << "\n"
00248              << "isConsoleWindowHidden = " << (isConsoleHidden ? "1" : "0") << "\n"
00249              << "statusBarString = " << (p ? p->getSBString() : "") << "\n"
00250              << "currentTime = " << QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString() << "\n"
00251              << "beginTime = " << (p ? p->getBeginTime().toString() : "") << "\n"
00252              << "width = " << stimApp()->glWin()->width() << "\n"
00253              << "height = " << stimApp()->glWin()->height() << "\n"
00254              << "fpsAvg = " << (p ? p->getFps() : 0.) << "\n"
00255              << "fpsMin = " << (p ? p->getFpsMin() : 0.) << "\n"
00256              << "fpsMax = " << (p ? p->getFpsMax() : 0.) << "\n"
00257              << "fpsLast = " << (p ? p->getFpsCur() : 0.) << "\n"
00258              << "frameNum = " << (p ? p->getFrameNum() : -1) << "\n"
00259              << "hardwareFrameCount = " << hwfc << "\n"
00260              << "haAccurateHWFrameCount = " << (hasAccurateHWFrameCount() ? "1" : "0") << "\n"
00261              << "calibraredRefreshRate = " << stimApp()->refreshRate() << "\n"
00262              << "hwRefreshRate = " << getHWRefreshRate() << "\n"
00263              << "hasAccurateHWRefreshRate = " << (hasAccurateHWRefreshRate() ? 1 : 0) << "\n"
00264              << "numMissedFrames = " << (p ? p->getNumMissedFrames() : 0) << "\n";
00265         QDateTime now(QDateTime::currentDateTime()), beginTime(p ? p->getBeginTime() : now);
00266         double secs = beginTime.secsTo(now), fskipsPerSec = 0.;
00267         if (p && secs > 0.) {
00268             fskipsPerSec = p->getNumMissedFrames() / secs;
00269         }
00270         strm << "missedFramesPerSec = " << fskipsPerSec << "\n"
00271              << "saveDirectory = " << stimApp()->outputDirectory() << "\n"
00272              << "pluginList = ";
00273         QList<QString> plugins = stimApp()->glWin()->plugins();
00274         for (QList<QString>::const_iterator it = plugins.begin(); it != plugins.end(); ++it) {
00275             if (it != plugins.begin()) strm << ", ";
00276             strm << *it;
00277         }
00278         strm << "\n"
00279              << "programUptime = " << getTime() << "\n"
00280              << "nProcessors = " << getNProcessors() << "\n"
00281              << "hostName = " << getHostName() << "\n"
00282              << "uptime = " << getUpTime() << "\n";
00283         
00284         strm.flush();
00285         return theStr;
00286     } else if (cmd == "GETPARAMS" && toks.size()) {
00287         QString pluginName = toks.join(" ");
00288         StimPlugin *p;
00289         if ( (p = stimApp()->glWin()->pluginFind(pluginName)) ) {
00290             return p->getParams().toString();
00291         }
00292     } else if (cmd == "SETPARAMS" && toks.size()) {
00293         QString pluginName = toks.join(" ");
00294         StimPlugin *p;
00295         if ( (p = stimApp()->glWin()->pluginFind(pluginName))
00296              && (stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin() != p) ) {
00297             Debug() << "Sending: READY";
00298             sock.write("READY\n");
00299             QString paramstr ("");
00300             QTextStream paramts(&paramstr, QIODevice::WriteOnly/*|QIODevice::Text*/);
00301             QString line;
00302             while ( sock.canReadLine() || sock.waitForReadyRead() ) {
00303                 line = sock.readLine().trimmed();
00304                 if (!line.length()) break;
00305                 Debug() << "Got Line: " << line;
00306                 paramts << line << "\n";
00307             }
00308             paramts.flush();
00309             p->setParams(paramstr);
00310             return "";
00311         } else if (p && stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin() == p) {
00312             Error() << "SETPARAMS cannot be called on a plugin that is running";
00313         } else if (!p) {
00314             Error() << "SETPARAMS called on a non-existant plugin";
00315         }
00316     } else if (cmd == "RUNNING") {
00317         StimPlugin *p = stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin();
00318         if (p) {
00319             return p->name();
00320         }
00321         return "";
00322     } else if (cmd == "ISPAUSED") {
00323         return QString::number(stimApp()->glWin()->isPaused());
00324     } else if (cmd == "PAUSE") {
00325         if (!stimApp()->glWin()->isPaused())
00326             stimApp()->glWin()->pauseUnpause();
00327         return "";
00328     } else if (cmd == "UNPAUSE") {
00329         if (stimApp()->glWin()->isPaused())
00330             stimApp()->glWin()->pauseUnpause();
00331         return "";
00332     } else if (cmd == "ISCONSOLEHIDDEN") {
00333         GetSetEvent *e = new IsConsoleHiddenEvent;
00334         GetSetData *d = e->d;
00335         stimApp()->postEvent(this, e);
00336         QString ret = QString::number(int(d->getReply<bool>()));
00337         delete d;
00338         return ret;
00339     } else if (cmd == "CONSOLEHIDE") {
00340         stimApp()->postEvent(this, new ConsoleHideEvent());
00341         return "";
00342     } else if (cmd == "CONSOLEUNHIDE") {
00343         stimApp()->postEvent(this, new ConsoleUnHideEvent());
00344         return "";
00345     } else if (cmd == "START" && toks.size()) {
00346         // this commands needs to be executed in the main thread
00347         // to avoid race conditions and also to have a valid opengl context
00348         QString pluginName = toks.front();
00349         bool startUnpaused = toks.size() > 1 && toks[1].toInt();
00350         if ( (stimApp()->glWin()->pluginFind(pluginName)) ) {
00351             stimApp()->postEvent(this, new StartStopPluginEvent(pluginName, startUnpaused));
00352             return "";
00353         }
00354     } else if (cmd == "STOP") {
00355         // this commands needs to be executed in the main thread
00356         // to avoid race conditions and also to have a valid opengl context
00357         bool doSave = toks.join("").toInt();
00358         if (stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin())
00359             stimApp()->postEvent(this, new StartStopPluginEvent(doSave)); 
00360         return "";
00361     } else if (cmd == "GETSAVEDIR") {
00362         return stimApp()->outputDirectory();
00363     } else if (cmd == "SETSAVEDIR") {
00364         QString dir = toks.join(" ");
00365         return stimApp()->setOutputDirectory(dir) ? QString("") : QString::null;
00366     } else if (cmd == "GETVERSION") {
00367         return VERSION_STR;
00368     } else if (cmd == "BYE") {
00369         sock.close();
00370     } 
00371     // add more cmds here
00372     return QString::null;
00373 }
00374 
00376 bool ConnectionThread::eventFilter(QObject *watched, QEvent *event)
00377 {
00378     int type = static_cast<int>(event->type());
00379     if (watched == this) {
00380         switch (type) {
00381         case StartPluginEventType: {
00382             // Start a plugin received
00383             StartStopPluginEvent *e = dynamic_cast<StartStopPluginEvent *>(event);
00384             if (e) {
00385                 StimPlugin *p = stimApp()->glWin()->pluginFind(e->plugin);
00386                 if (p) p->start(e->flag);            
00387             }
00388         }
00389             return true;
00390 
00391         case StopPluginEventType: {
00392             // Stop a plugin received
00393             StartStopPluginEvent *e = dynamic_cast<StartStopPluginEvent *>(event);
00394             if (e) {
00395                 StimPlugin *p = stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin();
00396                 if (p) p->stop(e->flag, false);
00397             }
00398         }
00399             return true;
00400 
00401         case GetHWFrameCountEventType: {
00402             GetSetEvent *e = dynamic_cast<GetSetEvent *>(event);
00403             if (e) {
00404                 e->d->setReply(getHWFrameCount());
00405             }
00406         }
00407             return true;
00408         case GetFrameEventType: {
00409             GetSetEvent *e = dynamic_cast<GetSetEvent *>(event);
00410             if (e) {
00411                 unsigned num = e->d->req.toUInt();
00412                 int datatype = e->d->datum.toInt();
00413                 StimPlugin *p;
00414                 if ((p=stimApp()->glWin()->runningPlugin()) && stimApp()->glWin()->isPaused()) {
00415                     e->d->setReply(p->getFrameDump(num, datatype));
00416                 } else
00417                     e->d->setReply(QByteArray());
00418             }
00419         }
00420             return true;
00421 
00422         case IsConsoleHiddenEventType: {
00423             GetSetEvent *e = dynamic_cast<GetSetEvent *>(event);
00424             if (e && stimApp() && stimApp()->console()) {
00425                 e->d->setReply(stimApp()->console()->isHidden());
00426             }
00427         }
00428             return true;
00429 
00430         case ConsoleHideEventType: 
00431             if (stimApp() && stimApp()->console() && !stimApp()->console()->isHidden())
00432                 stimApp()->console()->hide();
00433             return true;
00434 
00435         case ConsoleUnHideEventType: 
00436             if (stimApp() && stimApp()->console() && stimApp()->console()->isHidden())
00437                 stimApp()->console()->show();
00438             return true;
00439 
00440         } // end switch
00441     }
00442     return QThread::eventFilter(watched, event);
00443 }
